entries.unlock_meeting: You have reset the locking mechanism on the meeting room door.
entries.already_open: This door was already opened by someone else...
entries.unlock_elevator: You have reset the locking mechanism on the elevator door.
entries.engine_set: You have set the engine to
entries.engine_result: The engine appears to be running normally.
entries.blew_up: You have successfully managed to destroy the engines!  Your mission is complete.
entries.fuel_50: You have set the Fuel Intake to 50%.
entries.fuel_30: You have set the Fuel Intake to 30%.
entries.fuel_80: You have set the Fuel Intake to 80%.
entries.engine_reset: The engines will have to be reset.

entries.hypr_20: You have set the Hyperdrive to 20%.
entries.hypr_60: You have set the Hyperdrive to 60%.
entries.elevator_locked: This elevator is disabled.  The Override switch is in the meeting room on this floor.
entries.meeting_room_locked: This keypad is disabled.  Use the SECURITY CONSOLE in the Engine Room to have it restored.
entries.keycard_success: You have successfully used a keycard to open this door.
entries.wont_fit: That object will not fit into this droid...
entries.computer_one: The screen is filled with number crunching.  Probably the hyper drive analysis.
entries.computer_two: This screen shows irregularities with the fuel intake valves.  They are currently functioning normally.
entries.computer_three: Gold Screen of Doom: Software has caused a general protection fault @ 64x11300314  Unknown Error 55113-s.
entries.reboot: This computer needs to be rebooted.  Please insert Operations Disk #4 into the terminal.
entries.sliced: The computer was down, but your slicing skill allows you to reboot it without the disk.
entries.insert_disk: You insert the disk into the drive and the machine reboots.
entries.journal: Journal Entry #334: We've found a strange glitch with the engines and the new fuel type we're using.  Apparently if you set the hyperdrive settings lower than the fuel intake, then drop the engines to their lowest power level; it's only a matter of time before the fuel pressure causes a catastrophic failure.
entries.officer_port: Printing Out Security Code for Officer Quarters, Port Side:
entries.officer_starboard: Printing out Security Code for Officer Quarters, Starboard Side:
entries.pdroid_congrats: Oh he did it!  Good work!
entries.pdroid_instructions: I'm afraid my counterpart here is missing his maintenance module.  If you could retrieve it he could make his way across the room and shut off the power surge.
entries.pdroid_excellent: I can't tell you how happy we were to have served you.
entries.prison_code: Printing out Security Code for Prisoner quarters:
entries.escape_pods: You have completed your assignment!  Make your way to the escape pods before time expires and get off this ship!
entries.reward: You have done well.  Return to the person who gave you this assignment and receive your reward.
entries.droid_explanation_rebel: I knew this would be worth it.  We've found nothing but evidence of the Alliance's treachery since we boarded and took this ship.  The engine room is even filled with illegal battle droids.  An electrical surge down there has made them all aggressive so I'm keeping non-essential personnel away from the area.  These Rebels have got to be stopped!
entries.droid_explanation_imperial: I tried to convince the Lieutenant that the battle droids were a bad idea, but he got such a good deal on them from the merc's that it was hard to turn down.  Now they're all over the place though.  I think the engine room is full of them.  Some kind of malfunction or short circuit.  As soon as we get near a base I'll call for a commando squad to come in and deactivate them...
entries.escape_pod_message: WARNING!  Using the escape pods will remove you from the Corvette with no method of returning!
entries.hyperdrive_settings: Select Power setting for the Hyperdrive: Exiting without setting the Hyperdrive power setting will force it to its default state.
entries.engine_settings: Select Engine settings for the Corvette: Exiting without making a selection will force the engine to its default setting.
entries.fuel_settings: Select Fuel Intake settings for the Corvette: Exiting without making a selection will force the fuel intake to its default setting.
entries.not_in_combat: The Droid Module can't be fitted into this droid while you are in combat.
